title: badmintonInfo website
overview: badmintonInfo is a dynamic website that showcases badminton gear and professional players that use them. The site utilized XAMPP for local development environment, PHP for server-side scripting, and MySQL for database management. UI wise, this was the first time I designed a site using Bootstrap for clean, easy, and reusable code.

title: Portfolio websites
description: my old static and current react website
overview: This website is supposed to be the culmination of everything I've learned so far, I made it using React (Vite) and Bootstrap. This website is a remake and upgrade of my old website LINK HERE that I made during reading break in an effort to learn React.
